xuiPopover
directive in module xui

Description

XUI Popover component is a popup control which can contain any HTML markup and be applied to block or in-line elements. It can also be understood as a rich tooltip. Note: popover will display inner content of the element, instead, text from the xuiPopover attribute will be placed on the page.

Usage

as attribute
<ANY xui-popover
     xui-popover-content="{xui.IContentProvider}"
     [xui-popover-placement="{string}"]
     [xui-popover-title="{string}"]
     [xui-popover-id="{string}"]
     [xui-popover-trigger="{string}"]
     [xui-popover-icon="{string}"]
     [xui-popover-status="{string}"]
     [xui-popover-is-displayed="{boolean}"]
     [xui-popover-is-modal="{boolean}"]
     [xui-popover-on-show="{function}"]
     [xui-popover-on-hide="{function}"]
     [xui-popover-element="{object}"]>
   ...
</ANY>

Parameters

ParamTypeDetails
xuiPopoverContentxui.IContentProvider

Text or templateURL to be rendered as popover content.

xuiPopoverPlacement
(optional)
string

Preferred direction to show popover. Values: 'left' or 'right'.

xuiPopoverTitle
(optional)
string

Heading text.

xuiPopoverId
(optional)
string

Unique identifier for the popover.

xuiPopoverTrigger
(optional)
string

Defines what event should trigger the popover. Supports a space separated list of event names. Values: 'mouseenter', 'click', or 'focus'.

(default: 'mouseenter')

xuiPopoverIcon
(optional)
string

Icon decoration for the popover {application, database}. This parameter is passed to the xuiIcon component.

xuiPopoverStatus
(optional)
string

Status decoration for the popover {warning, error}. This parameter is passed to the xuiIcon component. This parameter can be combined with xuiPopoverIcon parameter to dispaly icon with status together, the child status is supported as well.

xuiPopoverIsDisplayed
(optional)
boolean

This parameter provides programmatic access to opening/closing the popover.

xuiPopoverIsModal
(optional)
boolean

Display popover in a modal fashion (with a darkened backdrop on top of the page).

xuiPopoverOnShow
(optional)
function

Callback triggered when popover is being shown.

xuiPopoverOnHide
(optional)
function

Callback triggered when popover is being hidden.

xuiPopoverElement
(optional)
object

This is an advanced property. Use it only if you know what you're doing. Allows you to bind the popover to an element provided through reference. Since Angular doesn't allow passing elements directly, it needs to be passed as {nestedElement: element}.
